scripts.back-deploy: cd udagram/udagram-api && eb init udagram-api -r $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -p node.js && eb use udagram-api-prod && eb setenv POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST DB_PORT=$DB_PORT PORT=$PORT POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET && eb deploy
scripts.front-deploy: aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read udagram/udagram-frontend/www s3://aboshama-bucket
